PERSONA:
meet karen thompson, a 42-year-old white non-hispanic woman living in the metropolitan area of the middle atlantic region of the northeast. born and raised in the united states, karen grew up in a middle-class family and has been a lifelong resident of the region. she is a high school graduate and has not pursued further education beyond that. 

karen's life has had its share of ups and downs, having gone through a divorce a few years ago. she identifies as roman catholic and attends church services a few times a year, often on special occasions or holidays. despite her faith, she does not consider herself a born-again or evangelical christian.

politically, karen identifies as an independent but leans towards the republican party. she considers herself a moderate with liberal tendencies, often finding common ground between the two ideologies. her income falls in the lower-income tier, ranging from $30,000 to less than $40,000 per year.

as a registered voter, karen is certain about her voter registration at her current address and exercises her right to vote in local and national elections. she is an avid user of the internet, accessing it almost constantly for various purposes, including staying informed about current events and news.

in her free time, karen does not engage in volunteer work but focuses on her personal life and professional pursuits. her marital status as a divorced woman has likely influenced her priorities, which now revolve around personal growth, financial stability, and building a fulfilling life. despite the challenges she has faced, karen remains optimistic and strives to make a positive impact in her community through her daily life and interactions.
